Be Fit Delivery

Working with Be Fit Delivery was more focused in graphic design and marketing.
Be Fit Delivery was a food delivery company focused in healthy food.
Working with them since the development of the logo, into the graphic identity, like Facebook covers.
During the planning, until the official release of the company, I worked into some teaser images.
Also developed monthly menus.
And promotional pieces.
Planning ahead, I developed the screens for a mobile application for Be Fit Delivery.
